# Withering Palm (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]]

**Level:** [[7th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 7]], Decay 7, Maho 7, [[7th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 7]], [[7th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 7]], [[7th Level Wu Jen Spells|Wu jen 7]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 13th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 13]], [[BoXM 13th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 13]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Living creature touched

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 241

*A black shroud of magical energy surrounds your hands. Beneath the shroud your hands look withered and aged, like uncared-for ancient leather on the verge of crumbling to dust.*

Your successful melee touch attack deals 1 point of Strength damage and 1 point of Constitution damage per two caster levels to the target (maximum of 10 points each). If you score a critical hit, the subject takes ability drain instead, but the effect is not doubled.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Maho 7, Wu jen 7 to Level per Oriental Adventures.

*House Rule:* Added Decay 7 to Level per Eberron Campaign Setting.

*House Rule:* Added Sorcerer 7, Wizard 7 to Level.
